ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Deep field quantum tech that will allow the storage of, well, anything, indefinitely, in a quantum pocket dimension, provided you have enough power.
Also, gives you the power to dematerialize Pawns and Items from across the map.
This tech enables the Dematerializer tech, if you have that mod.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Teleportation
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Beam me up, Scotty!"
This tech enables the Archotech Teleporter tech, if you have that mod.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stargate Astro Navigation
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying the symbols on the device you have discovered and cross-referencing with stellar constellations you have found out how to activate it and travel to other locations.
